set terminal png size 1024,768
set output 'caar_chart.png'
set title 'Avg CAAR for 3 Groups'
set xlabel 'Announcement Date'
set ylabel 'Avg CAAR(%)'
set xrange [-58:58]
set grid
set xtics 20
set arrow from 0,graph(0,0) to 0,graph(1,1) nohead lc rgb 'red' lw 2
plot '-' with lines lw 2 title 'Miss', '-' with lines lw 2 title 'Meet', '-' with lines lw 2 title 'Beat'
